reasons: consistent lines;best match to intended lyrics
output:
Day after day, holding my breath.
Hour after hour, how many hours are left?
Drop after drop, many to forget.
Day after day, counting my breaths.
Oh no.
Day after day, starving my mind.
Statement after statement, line after line.
Bite after bite, many left behind.
Day after day, feeding my mind.
Oh no.
